ygData.subject: RE: Dual Wielding Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Your combine will be good for power.  You can, at first,  get the fastest wep you can easily find - like a normal dagger -  for dual wield and use it no matter
ygData.messageBody:
Your combine will be good for power. You can, at first, get the fastest
wep you can easily find - like a normal dagger - for dual wield and use it
no matter how powerfull it is so that you get more swings and thus more
skill checks to build your dual wield skill. Then start working on a dirk -
it's worth it. In the meantime you could get a Crook Stinger by killing the
named wasp in Lfay - uhm level 12? You will need some helpers I think - he
was really easy when I killed him when I was 18ish - I think - I might have
been 20ish.

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 34th song
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. Dragoon Dirk - don't leave home without it!

p.s.s. what shall it be today? Staff of Writhing, Dragoon Dirk, Ashenwood
Short Spear, Barbed Leather Whip, Polish Garnet Tommychopper.

SoW DD ASS BLW PGT
SoW
DD
ASS
BLW
PGT

p.s.s.s. yes I do want claws - just never got em yet. our group just cant
stand the Pit Of Whiners - maybe we will drop in some time real late or
ungodly early.

-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Cathell [mailto:embroidery@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 9:07 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Dual Wielding Bards

From: "Eric Cathell" <embroidery@...>

Ok this question maybe moot...but once we start dual
wielding what's a good
combination? I currently have a combine scim..and was
thinking of a combine
spear or rapier...Sure i know everyone's favorite is Dvinn's
dagger...and if
i can that's what i will get..but playing on the TS makes
things a little
harder to come by sometimes. So any thoughts?

Jalaric
12 Song
Test Server
